column5: WOW WHAT A COW!!!!!!Good deal Limey!FC
Limey,Congrats Again!
That's great Limey! Hey--If I promise to plead "Just one more cast, Limey" like your son Jack did do I get to go out with you sometime? What a day on the water. Thanks for Sharing
nice work there Simon...great fish!
Congrats on the PB Simon - it's a beauty, eh!
That's a gigantic fish for NW Ontario. VERY few fish that size. That thing would look like the Goodyear Blimp full of eggs.
WOW! Amazing, congrats on the PB. So many nice fish- great video as always Limey
Holy crap indeed Simon!Wow, team 5 must be leading the Walleye catigory now.Jim(ps - nice to see your reports again after my self-imposed exile from OFN)
Quite a day Limey, Congrats! What lake were you on?
Great fish and great video..my question is, since you are by yourself how are you filming..do you have your filming device hanging from a lanyard around your neck?..thats what it looks like to me..
Simon,You are the man.Maybe we can hook up sometime & try your methods on my home lk.Big eyes in here but I can't seem to find them.
Got my new PB today of 32.5".30'FOW on flats near the drop offs were key, it was on a deeper lake that holds Lake Trout too.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aNFNK5DUP7ATight lines all.

very cool!! congrats on the major trophy! i have found that lake trout lakes - which are clear in in-fertile - will produce fewer but larger walleye - this your experience? what lake was this on? phish
Holy ssssssssmokes! What a day of fishing. You really laid into the big gals. Big huge congrats on your pb 32 1/2"er. They just don't get much bigger than that.
Nice work! I bet that was quite a battle from that deep!! I bet seeing that big girl swim away felt good too!
Amazing Fish!

Wow! What a day on the water! The video was only 10-11 minutes of your day, but those 10-11 minutes would make a whole day. Those were some big walleye and just one after the other. Thanks for sharing.
The video is edited...that is about 4 hours of fishing condensed into 11 minutes.
Oh I got that. I'm just saying that small fraction of your day would make a whole day a great one. I just didn't word it very well. I must have still been in awe of your mad fishing skills!

Great day on the water...............You are one lucky guy, to have that kind of fishing in your backyard. Save a few for us poor folk............I'll be up September 1. Great job Limeyangler............Thanks for posting !
Very nice fish!!!!!!!
